document_data.mainbody:
The Black Bulls Tail was a poor-quality inn and tavern found in the village of Uluvin, in the Delimbiyr Vale.
While the tavern offered discretion, in the way of private rooms, its libations were limited to watered-down beer and old Winter Wine.
The Black Bulls Tail was nearly completely destroyed by a group of hill giants during the late 15 century DR.
